name: Forgecraft
description:
Welcome to Forgecraft!

Get crafting smithy! You've got orders piling up & a forge going cold so go jump into a world filled with cute creatures, determined adventureres and your trust hammer.

Its forgining time!

Controls

WASD - Move
Space - Jump
Shift - Hold to Sprint
E - Use
Left Click - Use Tool / Throw Held Item
Right Click - Pickup Item / Drop Held Item
Escape - Pause
1 - Equip Pickaxe
2 - Equip Axe
3 - Equip Hammer

[Pressing the same number again will put the weapon away]

List of free assets used

This was my entry for the November 2022 MetaFab $10,000 On-Chain Jam! \o/
